General.Name: SNT Dynamics Co Ltd
General.Description: SNT DYNAMICS CO.,Ltd manufactures and sells precision machinery in South Korea and internationally. It provides defense products comprising mobile equipment, guns and cannon systems, and protection weapons; auto parts, such as axles and transmission products; and machine tools, such as gear cutting machines, CNC vertical lathes, grinding machines, and universal lathes. The company was formerly known as S&T Dynamics Co. Ltd. and changed its name to SNT DYNAMICS CO.,Ltd in February 2021. SNT DYNAMICS CO.,Ltd was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Changwon, South Korea.

9.Name: Ki-Bong  Hong
